DOC.detailed_description: Participants retrospectively investigate clinical data anesthesia process 15 preterm infant anesthesia chart ROP underwent DLP 2014 2016 . This present retrospective study confirm Institutional Clinical Research Ethics Board . Neonates burn 30 week gestation low birth weigh 2000 g admit study . No infant exclude study . Preterm infant appreciate surgery inform consent obtain form parent . We record gestational age , American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) physical status score , post-conceptual age , weight birth surgery , duration anesthesia surgery , blood glucose value surgery , management airway , total hospital stay period , analgesia management , complication comorbidities . Bradycardia ( < 90 beats/mean ) , desaturation ( SpO2 < 90 % ) arrhythmia record . Electrocardiography ( ECG ) , pulse oximetric saturation ( SpO2 ) , end-tidal carbon dioxide pressure , heart rate ( HR ) body temperature monitor operating room . Topical 0.5 % proparacaine eye drop administer infant routinely . Anesthesia induce thiopental 6 mg kg-1 fentanyl 1 µg kg-1 maintain 50 % oxygen 50 % air 1 % -3 % sevoflurane case . Inhaled anesthetic agent preferred induction anesthesia cause hypotension . The premature infant intubate experienced anesthesiologist . After surgery , extubation perform spontanea ventilation enough extubation record . All infant take newborn intensive care unit ( NICU ) . Data report mean ± standard deviation percentage ( % ) .
